# https://forum.posit.co/t/when-to-use-yaml-vs-when-to-use-setup-code-chunk/56169/
title: "`r params$doc_title`"
author: "MHKim"
date: "`r Sys.setlocale('LC_ALL', 'en_US.utf8'); format(Sys.time(), '%B %d, %Y')`"
output:
  html_notebook:  
    toc: yes
    toc_depth: 6
    toc_float:
      collapsed: false
      smooth_scroll: false
    number_sections: false
    code_folding: none
    df_print: tibble
    highlight: textmate
    fig_width: 10
    fig_height: 6
  html_document:
    toc: yes
    toc_depth: 6
    toc_float:
      collapsed: false
      smooth_scroll: false
    number_sections: false
    df_print: tibble
    code_folding: none
    highlight: textmate
    fig_width: 10
    fig_height: 6
  pdf_document: 
    toc: yes
    toc_depth: 6
    fig_width: 10
    fig_height: 6
    latex_engine: xelatex  # mainfont, sansfont, monofont, mathfont works only with xelatex and lualatex, but not pdflatex
    keep_tex: true
  word_document:
    toc: yes
    toc_depth: 6
    fig_width: 9
    fig_height: 6
# documentclass: scrartcl  # https://pandoc.org/MANUAL.html#variables-for-latex
# classoption: fontsize=9pt 
geometry: portrait, a3paper, margin=20mm # https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/pdf-document.html#latex-options
# fontsize: 12pt
header-includes: 
  - \usepackage{fontspec}
  - \newcommand{\setfallbackfont}[4]{
      \IfFontExistsTF{#2}
        {#1{#2}}
        {\IfFontExistsTF{#3}
          {#1{#3}}
          {#1{#4}}}}
  # - \setfallbackfont{\setmainfont}{Roboto Condensed}{Noto Sans Condensed}{Arial Narrow}
  # - \setfallbackfont{\setsansfont}{Roboto Condensed}{Noto Sans Condensed}{Arial Narrow}
  - \setfallbackfont{\setmainfont}{Roboto}{Noto Sans}{Arial}
  - \setfallbackfont{\setsansfont}{Roboto}{Noto Sans}{Arial}
  - \setfallbackfont{\setmonofont}{Cascadia Code SemiBold}{Cascadia Code}{Fira Code}
  - \usepackage[hangul]{kotex}
  - \setfallbackfont{\setmainhangulfont}{NanumGothic}{HCR Dotum LVT}{Malgun Gothic}
  - \setfallbackfont{\setsanshangulfont}{NanumGothic}{HCR Dotum LVT}{Malgun Gothic}
  - \setfallbackfont{\setmonohangulfont}{D2Coding}{NanumGothicCoding}{NanumGothic}

## \$ original_function <- function(path0, path_last = getwd(), max_hierarchy = 5) {
```{r, results="markup", collapse=TRUE, paged.print=FALSE, comment="", R.options=list(width=120)}
library(stringr)
library(purrr)

# Original function
original_function <- function(path0, path_last = getwd(), max_hierarchy = 5) {
  path0_escaped <- gsub("([][{}()+*^$|])", "\\\\\\1", path0)
  list_paths <- vector("list", max_hierarchy + 1)
  list_paths[[1]] <- path0
  
  for (i in 1:max_hierarchy) {
    pattern <- paste0("^", path0_escaped, strrep("/[^/]+", i))
    list_paths[[i + 1]] <- str_extract(path_last, pattern)
  }
  
  list_paths <- lapply(list_paths, function(x) if (is.null(x)) NA else x)
  return(list_paths)
}

# Example paths
path_last <- "D:/OneDrive/[][Rproject]/github_tidystat/Rdev"
path0 <- "D:/OneDrive/[][Rproject]"
max_hierarchy <- 5

# Test original function
print(original_function(path0, path_last, max_hierarchy))
```


## \$ v2_function <- function(path0, path_last = getwd(), max_hierarchy = 5) {
```{r, results="markup", collapse=TRUE, paged.print=FALSE, comment="", R.options=list(width=120)}
library(stringr)
library(purrr)

# Version 2 function with debugging prints
v2_function <- function(path0, path_last = getwd(), max_hierarchy = 5) {
  # Escape special characters in path0 for regex
  path0_escaped <- path0 |> str_replace_all("([]\\[{}()+*?^$|.-])", "\\\\\\1")
  
  cat("Original path0: ", path0, "\n")
  cat("Escaped path0: ", path0_escaped, "\n\n")
  
  list_paths <- vector("list", max_hierarchy + 1)
  list_paths[[1]] <- path0
  
  for (i in 1:max_hierarchy) {
    pattern <- paste0("^", path0_escaped, strrep("/[^/]+", i))
    extracted_path <- str_extract(path_last, pattern)
    
    cat("Pattern: ", pattern, "\n")
    cat("Extracted path: ", extracted_path, "\n\n")
    
    list_paths[[i + 1]] <- extracted_path
  }
  
  list_paths <- lapply(list_paths, function(x) if (is.null(x)) NA else x)
  return(list_paths)
}

# Example paths
path_last <- "D:/OneDrive/[][Rproject]/github_tidystat/Rdev"
path0 <- "D:/OneDrive/[][Rproject]"
```

## \$ v3_function <- function(path0, path_last = getwd(), max_hierarchy = 5) {
```{r, results="markup", collapse=TRUE, paged.print=FALSE, comment="", R.options=list(width=120)}
# Version 3 function
v3_function <- function(path0, path_last = getwd(), max_hierarchy = 5) {
  special_chars <- c("\\[", "\\]", "\\(", "\\)", "\\{", "\\}", "\\.", "\\+", "\\*", "\\?", "\\^", "\\$", "\\|")
  path0_escaped <- path0
  for (char in special_chars) {
    path0_escaped <- str_replace_all(path0_escaped, char, paste0("\\", char))
  }
  
  list_paths <- vector("list", max_hierarchy + 1)
  list_paths[[1]] <- path0
  
  for (i in 1:max_hierarchy) {
    pattern <- paste0("^", path0_escaped, strrep("/[^/]+", i))
    list_paths[[i + 1]] <- str_extract(path_last, pattern)
  }
  
  list_paths <- lapply(list_paths, function(x) if (is.null(x)) NA else x)
  return(list_paths)
}

# Example paths
path_last <- "D:/OneDrive/[][Rproject]/github_tidystat/Rdev"
path0 <- "D:/OneDrive/[][Rproject]"
max_hierarchy <- 5

# Test version 3 function
print(v3_function(path0, path_last, max_hierarchy))
```


## \$ v4_function <- function(path0, path_last = getwd(), max_hierarchy = 5) {
```{r, results="markup", collapse=TRUE, paged.print=FALSE, comment="", R.options=list(width=120)}
# Version 4 function
v4_function <- function(path0, path_last = getwd(), max_hierarchy = 5) {
  path0_escaped <- gsub("([][{}()+*^$|])", "\\\\\\1", path0)
  
  extract_path <- function(i) {
    pattern <- paste0("^", path0_escaped, strrep("/[^/]+", i))
    str_extract(path_last, pattern)
  }
  
  list_paths <- vector("list", max_hierarchy + 1)
  list_paths[[1]] <- path0
  list_paths[2:(max_hierarchy + 1)] <- map(1:max_hierarchy, extract_path)
  list_paths <- lapply(list_paths, function(x) if (is.null(x)) NA else x)
  return(list_paths)
}

# Example paths
path_last <- "D:/OneDrive/[][Rproject]/github_tidystat/Rdev"
path0 <- "D:/OneDrive/[][Rproject]"
max_hierarchy <- 5

# Test version 4 function
print(v4_function(path0, path_last, max_hierarchy))
```
